oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tall Tales - #02 - 'The Bell Witch'
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Tall Tales, episode #2. Featuring the tale 'The Bell Witch', written by Bill Woolsey, read by Bobby Wiener, produced by Marjorie Cooney, with ballad singer George Grise. Original broadcast date of October 6, 1953.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Grise
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: The Bell Witch' (Bobby Wiener, cast) -- Announcer closing statement
